document_data.mainbody: '''Arauntar''' was a [[Harper]] operating as a caravan driver in the [[Sword Coast]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: Arauntar could wield two swords.{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|232-235|14}}
document_data.Relationships: As of {{yearlink|1357}}, [[Tessaril Winter]] was aware of Arauntar and [[Beldimarr]]'s status as [[Harper]]s. Both of them worked for [[Orthil Voldovan]], who wasn't a Harper himself.{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|16,18-19|1}} She, too, was an acquaintance of his'. Arauntar and Beldimarr had a pact to kill each other if the other was to ever be mortally wounded and left in agony.
